scripts.release:version: git commit -am ":bookmark: $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:version
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:version
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:version
